discoveries.HumanInSpace: First animals and plants to leave Earth orbit and travel to and around the Moon.
discoveries.TechAdvance: first lunar spacecraft to be recovered successfully.
First orbital ultraviolet observatory.

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First human excursion beyond low Earth orbit.
discoveries.HumanInSpace2: First in-person observations of Earth from a distance.
discoveries.TechAdvance: First Trans-Earth injection.
discoveries.HumanInSpace3: First human flight to another celestial body (the Moon) and to enter its gravitational influence.

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First docking between two crewed spacecraft in Earth orbit.

discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to parachute in Venus's atmosphere, lost contact before landing.

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First docking of two crewed spacecraft around another celestial body.
discoveries.TechAdvance: First lunar mission to include a lunar landing module.

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First human on another celestial body (the Moon).
discoveries.HumanInSpace2: First words spoken from another world.
discoveries.Contact: First space launch from another celestial body.
discoveries.Contact2: First sample return from another celestial body.

discoveries.Contact: First rendezvous on the surface of a celestial body.
discoveries.HumanInSpace: First meet up between human explorers and a robotic spacecraft in space (on the Moon).
Farthest distance from Earth traveled by humans.

discoveries.TechAdvance: First X-ray orbital observatory.

discoveries.Contact: First automatic sample return from the Moon.

discoveries.TechAdvance: First lunar rover.

discoveries.Contact: First soft landing on another planet (Venus).

discoveries.TechAdvance: First space station.

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First crewed orbital observatory.

discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to impact another planet (Mars).
First soft landing on Mars.

discoveries.TechAdvance: First motor vehicle on another celestial body (Lunar Roving Vehicle).

discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to orbit another planet (Mars).

discoveries.TechAdvance: First spacecraft on a trajectory out of the solar system.
discoveries.TechAdvance2: First spacecraft to use all-nuclear electrical power (SNAP-19 RTGs).
discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to enter the asteroid belt.
discoveries.Contact2: First spacecraft beyond the orbit of Mars.

discoveries.TechAdvance: First orbital gamma ray observatory.

discoveries.Contact: First flyby of Jupiter.
discoveries.Contact2: First spacecraft beyond the Inner Solar System.

discoveries.Contact: First mission sent to study and flyby Mercury.
First spacecraft to return data on a long-period comet.
discoveries.Contact2: First mission to explore two planets in a single mission (Mercury and Venus).
discoveries.Contact3: First photograph of Venus from space.
discoveries.TechAdvance: First use of solar wind for spacecraft orientation.
discoveries.Contact4: First spacecraft to flyby the same planet multiple times (Mercury).

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First multinational crewed mission.

discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to orbit Venus.
discoveries.Contact2: First successful photos from the surface of another planet (Venus).

discoveries.Contact: First successful photos and soil samples from the surface of Mars.

discoveries.TechAdvance: First real time remotely operated ultraviolet orbital observatory.

discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to orbit the Sun at Lagrange 1.
First extended (multi-year) orbital exploration of Venus (from 1978 to 1992).
Jupiter flyby (closest approach 349,000 km).
discoveries.TechAdvance: Discovery of volcanism on Io.

discoveries.Contact: First flyby of Saturn.
discoveries.Contact2: First photograph of Titan from deep space.

discoveries.Contact: Saturn flyby (closest approach 124,000 km), close encounter of Titan and encounters with a dozen other moons.

discoveries.TechAdvance: First reusable crewed orbital spacecraft (Space Shuttle).

discoveries.Contact: First sound recording of another world (Venus).

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First mixed gender crew aboard space station, and first woman, Svetlana Savitskaya, on space station.

discoveries.TechAdvance: First spacecraft to conduct a deep survey of Earth's magnetic tail.
First Infrared orbital observatory.

discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft beyond the orbit of Neptune.
discoveries.Contact2: First spacecraft beyond all Solar System planets.

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First untethered spacewalk (Bruce McCandless II).
First spacewalk by a woman (Svetlana Savitskaya).

discoveries.Contact: First balloon deployed on another planet (Venus).
First spacecraft to flyby a comet (21P/Giacobini-Zinner).
First spacecraft to flyby Uranus.

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First consistently inhabited long-term research space station.

discoveries.Contact: First close up observations of a comet (Halley's Comet, 596 kilometers).

discoveries.missionName: Astronomers Bruce Campbell, Gordon Walker and Stephenson Yang.
discoveries.Contact: First suspected detection of an exoplanet (Gamma Cephei Ab).

discoveries.TechAdvance: First astrometric satellite.

discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to flyby Neptune.
discoveries.Contact2: First spacecraft to study all four of the solar system's giant planets at close range.

discoveries.TechAdvance: First orbital cosmic microwave observatory.

discoveries.Contact: First photograph of the whole Solar System (Family Portrait)

discoveries.TechAdvance: First telescope designed to be repaired in space
First time a spacecraft coming from deep space uses the Earth for a gravity-assist manoeuvre

discoveries.Contact: First asteroid flyby (951 Gaspra closest approach 1,600 km)
First confirmed observation of an exoplanet
First polar orbit around the Sun.
discoveries.Contact2: First mission to survey the space environment above and below the poles of the Sun.

discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to map Venus in its entirety

discoveries.HumanInSpace: Record longest duration spaceflight to date (437.7 day by Valeri Polyakov)

discoveries.Contact: First orbit of Jupiter
First spacecraft to enter the atmosphere of a gas giant (Jupiter)

discoveries.TechAdvance: First laser communication from space
First orbital radio observatory
First operational rover on another planet (Mars)
First spacecraft to use aerobraking to enter orbit (Martian orbit)

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First multinational space station.
discoveries.TechAdvance: Largest artificial object built in space to date.

discoveries.Contact: First orbit of an asteroid (433 Eros)
First landing on an asteroid (433 Eros)

discoveries.TechAdvance: First laser communication between two objects in space

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First amateur spaceflight

discoveries.Contact: First orbit of Saturn
First sample return beyond lunar orbit (solar wind)
First landing in the outer Solar System (Titan).
discoveries.Contact2: First landing on a moon other than Earth's Moon.

discoveries.Contact: First confirmed cryovolcano (Enceladus)
First spacecraft to impact a comet (Tempel 1)
First asteroid ascent (25143 Itokawa).
discoveries.TechAdvance: First interplanetary escape without separating and discarding the landing gear.

discoveries.Contact: First sample return from a comet (81P/Wild)
First confirmed lakes on the surface of another celestial body (lakes of Titan)
First spacecraft to photograph another spacecraft landing on another celestial body (Phoenix, on Mars)
First discovery of lunar water in the form of ice

discoveries.TechAdvance: First space telescope designated to search for Earth-like exoplanets

discoveries.Contact: First images of the structures in the rings of a planet (rings of Saturn)

discoveries.TechAdvance: First solar sail

discoveries.Contact: First sample return from an asteroid (25143 Itokawa)

discoveries.TechAdvance: First spacecraft to orbit one of the Moon's Lagrange point (L2)
First spacecraft to orbit the Moon's Lagrange 1 point

discoveries.Contact: First orbit of Mercury
First orbit of an object in the asteroid belt (4 Vesta)

discoveries.TechAdvance: First use of a sky crane to land on another celestial body (Mars)

discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to leave the heliosphere.

discoveries.TechAdvance: First laser communication with a lunar satellite

discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to orbit a comet nucleus (67P/Churyumov–Gerasimenko)
First soft landing on a comet (67P/Churyumov–Gerasimenko)
First flyby and orbit of a dwarf planet (Ceres).
discoveries.TechAdvance: First spacecraft to orbit two separate celestial bodies.

discoveries.Contact: First flyby of an object beyond Neptune (Pluto and its moons).
discoveries.Contact2: First flyby in the Kuiper belt.
discoveries.Contact3: First flyby of a trans-neptunian object.
discoveries.Contact4: Last original encounter with one of the nine major planets recognized before 2006.

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First food grown in space eaten (lettuce)

discoveries.TechAdvance: First observation of gravitational waves
First propulsive landing of a rocket after sending something into space (suborbital)
First propulsive landing of an orbital rocket

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First inflatable space habitat

discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to enter the atmosphere of Saturn
First known interstellar object detected passing through the Solar System

discoveries.TechAdvance: First operational rover on an asteroid (162173 Ryugu)

discoveries.Contact: First recorded sounds from Mars
First flyby of a classical Kuiper belt object (486958 Arrokoth).
discoveries.Contact2: First flyby of a contact binary.
discoveries.Contact3: First spacecraft to make two different flybys in the Kuiper belt.

discoveries.Contact: First soft landing on the far side of the Moon.
discoveries.HumanInSpace: First germination of seeds on another celestial body.

discoveries.TechAdvance: First lunar rover (Yutu-2) traversing the far side of the Moon

discoveries.Contact: First direct photograph of a black hole and its vicinity
First confirmed quake on another planet (marsquake)

discoveries.TechAdvance: First aerodynamically powered flight on another celestial body (Mars)

discoveries.HumanInSpace: First in situ resource utilization.
discoveries.Contact: First production of oxygen on another celestial body (Mars).
First spacecraft to fly through the atmosphere of a star (the Sun's corona)

discoveries.TechAdvance: Launch of the largest space telescope to date
First asteroid measurably deflected by a spacecraft.
discoveries.Contact: First spacecraft to make contact with an asteroid moon (impact on Dimorphos).
First landing at the lunar south polar region

discoveries.TechAdvance: First successful demonstration of in space propellant transfer
First successful instance of both stages of a launch vehicle returned for a controlled landing

discoveries.Contact: First samples returned from the far side of the Moon
